messages.message:
any thoughts on having some sort of "create into solution" or "export into build" feature with converse. I feel like Build is already pretty easy to use but the goto entry point for almost everyone is converse and I end up asking some pretty good questions and results with it for 1 document (lets say a resume).

Would be cool to then just feed these questions with this doc type into a build project so I can easily ask the same questions again and again which is what build does. Idk this is just a half-baked thought and i haven't used build much.
We had this in the initial version of ailabs. We can get it in cc: @Subash
somewhere where after a converse is done, you select all the QA that you want to add to build and then it builds it
That's again tiresome for the user maybe. What we did was put the entire convo into gpt and ask it what all was the user interested in and then build the flow / solution for those fields :fire:
What we have to do is figure out how to handle really long convos
